title: Greataxe +1
content:
Greataxe +1 Uncommon 2~13 Damage 1d12 +1 Slashing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A small prayer decorates the hilt of this axe. It resonates in your head when you touch it. Greataxe Two-Handed 3.15 85
